website_summaries.verdict: This option puts an end to rolling water bottles with extra deep side pockets that stretch to accommodate wider bottles. A solid choice for road warriors looking to keep organized and hydrated.
pros: Roomy main pockets work well for large, flat items
Features 2 padded compartments for laptops and tablets
Outer pockets offer easy access to pens, phones, and calculators
Plastic back support for added stability
Deep, wide side sleeves are ideal for large bottles
cons: Pockets can lose shape and start to sag when overfilled

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for something like these for nearly 20 years
customer_reviews.text: Just what a Pest Control Route Manager need in his service vehicle! I have been looking for something like these for nearly 20 years. This is so darn great to have I am beyond words. Well made! Well designed, PERFECTION! Could not have designed it better!. For Service Managers, Sales team and Service this will become the primary safety tool in every one of my trucks! clipboards, note book, mileage books, calculator, high lighters, pens I can't get enough said and many thanks to the designer. I will promote this to all my pest control people. Jerry Discreet Pest Control
customer_reviews.author: Discreet Pest Control

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have for commuting
customer_reviews.text: I commute/drive over 600 miles a week, so it is important to me to have certain items not only accessible, but organized and out of the way. I used to keep stuff on the front passenger seat and they would fall off or I'd have to move them if I ever needed to drive with somebody in the passenger seat. Nice to have to keep an umbrella, extra garbage bags, sun glasses, ear buds, extra chargers, packs with medicine, and on and on and whatever you wish to keep in there.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Bear Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love this organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer. It was just what I was looking for when working out of my car. I love the stiff back and the heavy material used for its construction. It fits well over the head-rest of my front passenger seat and is easy to lift off when, as an added bonus, I can slip the strap over my shoulder and carry it to my appointments with clients. My only request would be that the strap be a little wider for use as a shoulder strap. Otherwise, no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: JAL

customer_reviews.title: Great for organzing front seat clutter
customer_reviews.text: No more fishing around in front of or under the passenger seat for paperwork, pens, water bottles, etc. Doesn't look that big physically but easily holds full size clipboard, small 3 ring binder, drink bottles, pens, pads and cords for device charger. Easy to remove if you have a passenger.
customer_reviews.author: Oryx

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional item - great gift idea as well!
customer_reviews.text: Liked this item so much that I purchased another as a gift! Really lets you organize your auto and get rid of clutter in the floor, etc. One side holder has an umbrella in it, the other cup has a metal WaWa cup that fits nicely, it then stores my flashlight, tire pressure gauge, sunglasses, and a wire bound notebook - also a place to put a couple of ink pens - still room for more stuff! And, it easily swings around to the back seat to accommodate a front seat passenger. Quality is top notch! What is there not to like?!!
customer_reviews.author: miatagirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Unit
customer_reviews.text: Got in the patrol unit currently and it fits all my items perfectly from my ticket book to my note pads I use a crayon box for my pens and highlighters and that also fits if you need something just reach over and wahla its there
customer_reviews.author: TacPen

customer_reviews.title: It is better than the rest.
customer_reviews.text: I feel I have ordered all of the front seat organizers that are in this same category. I use my car as an office so I am always striving to organize, be efficient and find the best products that meet my needs. This item fits the bill for quality and durability. I feel the value is fair but all of these items tend to be high for what they are. Would definitely purchase this item again in the future but don't see it wearing out in the next decade.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect patrol bag for front seat organization. I’ve seen a lot of really bulky ones, that are three times the price tag. This has enough compartments to keep multiple notepads/documents and small compartments on the side where I can fit extra printer paper, blood kits, field drug test kits, etc. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke H

customer_reviews.title: Great item, lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: Great item, lots of pockets, with 2 that close. I'm using it on the back of the seat, not the front, for storage and guests. Only thing I would suggest, is that I wish it had a slip hole, toward the center of the lower back at least, or one in each corner of the lower back , to tie down the bottom so it doesn't flap around on the seat. Other than that its great!
customer_reviews.author: Harold Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great for visiting nurses!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I got back to the office after a weeks worth of admits with clean consents and no coffee stains to be found. A p,ace for pens and a notebook for quick notes on the fly. I keep coffee money handy. Best off all my grandson, who thinks I buy to much stuff I don’t need, really liked this. May get one for his truck. Now that’s an endorsement. 😆
customer_reviews.author: Willa Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Handy and tough
customer_reviews.text: Well made and designed, with plenty of room for everything you would need on the road. The bottle pockets are roomy, and stretch to fit, helping secure the bottles. It rides well on the seat, and hangs with little movement. The neoprene lined pocket that easily fits a laptop is great. The zippered pocket is handy for accessories, and the velcro is well made and strong, as well as the stitching. All around great, no complaints. I was unfortunately in a pretty severe car accident, but the organizer still stayed firmly on the seat, with everything still in it pockets, with no damage whatsoever. Can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Love the organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great seat Organizer. I use it on my front seat and I love it. It stores good a tissues box and CDs, Wipes, and other items. Moves good around to the back if someone rights on the front seat. Good quality. I used many other before, but this is the best one I have
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. I will be honest I returned it but not for any fault of its own. Great fabric, durable, and had a more modern style and I loved the grey color.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for a little over a year, 5 days a week and constantly going in and out of it... i had it that long, mostly because i’ve been too lazy to find a better one. the bottom of EVERY pocket has blow out. even the pen slots.. i have to find things to stuff in it otherwise everything falls out the bottom. the strap through the clip doesn’t hold and constantly slides out. The only thing i really liked about it was the amount of pouches for organization. it’s prices relatively close to similar items so it’s hard to decide the value for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Coolest

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage space.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I got this. It is really going to help. I have not put that much in it right now. Still finding stuff I should carry in it. Great for keeping my tissues in easy reach. There are so many pockets, and it is very sturdy. I can see this lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Niederberger

customer_reviews.title: Handy organizer
customer_reviews.text: Are usually pallet everything in my front seat and then we end up going somewhere and I have to throw everything into the backseat. As a home health nurse I need some of my stuff close by like my pins, paper, etc. With this organizer all I have to do is flip it around and my husband has somewhere to sit and I don’t have to adjust all of my stuff
customer_reviews.author: Jaylee Summers

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t sure I liked that, but it fits a few waters under ...
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps all my stuff in one spot, organized and in reach. I use this on the front seat in a semi truck. The strap isn’t quite long enough to stretch around the bottom of the seat so it sits a few inches off the base of the seat. Wasn’t sure I liked that, but it fits a few waters under it and works well. The strap has not loosened from where it started and I have each pocket filled. Only been using for about a week, but seems like this will last for awhile. Material is good quality. But only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Granite

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I believed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product because of the price and the size. Unfortunately after about a month, the bottom ripped out. It may not be made for heavy equipment like I have for my job. I’m in law enforcement and use it for my Posse Box and Citation Book. I can definitely see it being useful for notepads and lighter things.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for business travel
customer_reviews.text: Great organizer. I drive about 35,000 miles a year for business. This keeps my passenger seat organized with things I need to find quickly on the road. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I travel across the US and Canada so I was looking for an organizer that's within my reach. I keep my logbooks, binders, pens, flashlights, knives, snacks, sanitizer wipes, water and a couple paperback books in this. It has many pockets and seems to be very durable! I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Transport Girl Hustle

customer_reviews.title: My favorite office organizer.
customer_reviews.text: For semi truck driver. I couldn’t have designed it better for my needs. I can’t say enough good things about this. It’s very solid and easy to carry in and out of truck. All of my friends want one
customer_reviews.author: jerry mauney

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty sweet
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get a few things off my driver's seat and this worked really well. Its a little sturdier than the previous one I bought that had the strap break.
customer_reviews.author: AUSTIN TX

customer_reviews.title: The solution for my car work junk!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. After 20+ years of stuff flying around my car, I finally found the solution. I never wanted a bulky "seat office" that you had to take out every time for a passenger. This flips around to the back of the seat! wicked cool. Not huge. They give you the measurements if you want to know if your stuff fits. Perfect for moi.
customer_reviews.author: Shopmonster

customer_reviews.title: After I installed it I found it was a great place to store my Steering Wheel table
customer_reviews.text: It was cheaper than other brand names and shipping was free when I combined it with another item. After I installed it I found it was a great place to store my Steering Wheel table. When I have a passenger I just flip it around to the back of the seat, so easy. Thank you DMoose
customer_reviews.author: Edward Steelman

customer_reviews.title: Great organizational tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me keep my truck clean. I can put almost everything loose in this and it has kept my truck clean. Best purchase this week.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy&Pearls

customer_reviews.title: Item Is how advertised
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the camo for my son and the black one for my husband. They are both vehicle Transporters and needed to keep their paperwork, cargo keys and their personal items organized when they drive. This is perfect for them. Wish it was a little bit longer , like the length of the back of the car seat, however it still works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak straps
customer_reviews.text: This product is a very good product but did not last long. I had this product for three months before it broke, all that broke was the strap that holds it to the seat. Other than the straps being weak the pockets were perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Twill156

customer_reviews.title: Product as described by seller
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and would recommend to family . Haven’t had this product long enough to provide an accurate rating status re “durability”.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: It’s great quality very sturdy. I love all the different spots for my stuff. The floor in my car will be looking so much better now and my important stuff won’t get stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah and Andres

customer_reviews.title: Great car organizer
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought one for me. I'm a realtor and my car is usually my office! This kept everything in one place and easy to reach, and no mess! I bought this one for my daughter...who needed help in organizing her car, too! Love this organizer!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Organization great, but water bottle holder difficult
customer_reviews.text: Nice organizer. Fits everything great. Just wish bottle holders were bigger. They are a snug fit for water bottle which is good, however if you are driving alone like I do most days, you can not put the bottle back with one hand. You need 2 hands and well that's not safe if your driving. You have to stop the car. Other than that, I like it alot
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Lovato

customer_reviews.title: Small, but nice storage bag for my passenger seat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for a very reasonable price. Using it to store some small miscellaneous items in my new police cruiser. Happy with my purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Buckmaster

customer_reviews.title: Product as Described
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is well made and has lots of room for a variety of items. It can be used on the front or the back of a seat. Just what I needed to store a flashlight, notebooks, my MacBook Air, ink pens, a container of hand wipes, and other items in my 2016 GMC Canyon. Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach and adjust. Took the clutter off the front seat. Plenty of room for my clipboard, citation book and keyboard. Keeps the car organized.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t had very long but great so far.
customer_reviews.text: The product is just what i wanted for my car to store papers and other items that cluttered my shift console and passenger seat. It is extremely well made of sturdy material. Recommended product for organizing and tidying.""
customer_reviews.author: Liz H

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Lots of storage! Easy to access compartments! Lots of pen holders! Well worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Chaser2018

customer_reviews.title: Required purchase with small Fords.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar product from Duluth several years ago. My Ford Focus has a center console that barely holds a can of coke making this thing an absolute necessity. The Duluth bag was a little sturdier but it also cost a hell of a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Martinex

customer_reviews.title: would have liked a heavier denier material but that would have doubled ...
customer_reviews.text: Handy and practical, would have liked a heavier denier material but that would have doubled the price. I think it's a great value and well made. Lots of room to organize most of the stuff that used to occupy the front seat in a state of chaos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Only had it 2 weeks, but seems to have all the pockets i need for my mobile office. No issues yet!
customer_reviews.author: Wade W.

customer_reviews.title: Read the size
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I thought it would be. I expected it to hold more stuff. Also the strap doesn’t even fit around my seat so it hangs from the head rest
customer_reviews.author: Ben Steiger

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for the car
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed in my car to help keep front seat organized. I always say I have a SUV, but it is truly a two seater. Holds everything I normally have in my front seat or on the floor. I would suggest having a strap at the bottom to hold to seat better.
customer_reviews.author: Mama J

customer_reviews.title: Durable & convenient size
customer_reviews.text: This organizer fits my husband's patrol car perfectly and allows him to clear up space in the front of the car. It's sturdy and holds all of his work stuff where he can reach it easily. Plus, he enjoys the cupholders that aren't in the way of the rest of his equipment.
customer_reviews.author: happy8585

customer_reviews.title: So Handy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a lifesaver on a bus trip I lead to TX. I didn't get it for that, but thought it might work there - it did! Wrapped the strap around the bar in the front of the bus (in front of the front seats) and put my trip binder, pens, some snacks, etc. in it. So handy! Also like it for holding random work things in when I'm on the road. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for paperwork, clipboard, notepad, tablet, and then some.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever! My car doesn't have paperwork everywhere nor stacked on my dash! I swing it to the back of the passenger seat when I have a passenger, and can swing it right back when solo. Love it and I bought a 2nd one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: The Castona's

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a home health nurse and this has made my life so much easier! All my paperwork is so organized now!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nothing worse than having a front seat full of all your ...
customer_reviews.text: A true car organization life saver. Nothing worse than having a front seat full of all your work crap only to hit the brakes and have it all go flying. Worth every penny. Hold a large binder, laptop and iPad no problem plus a bunch of other crap. Buy it! You know you want to!
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: Works just how I needed it to
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Adds much needed storage and can easily swing around to the front of the seat for accessibility and the back of the seat if you have a passenger.
customer_reviews.author: Katy M

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Item was a gift and was substituted for a much more expensive name brand. It seems to be of equal or greater quality. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase I have made yet!
customer_reviews.text: I work as a deputy sheriff and bought this in hopes that it worked for me. All of my co workers have the 5.11 wingman bag. I received this and can say it is the best item I have purchased on amazon. It fits perfectly for my needs and keeps all of my paper work and folders organized and off of the seat. I can easily remove it when someone needs to sit in the passenger seat and it looks very neat and professional.
customer_reviews.author: SNL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a cop
customer_reviews.text: Husband purchased for his passenger seat to keep organized. I've heard no complaints so I guess he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: AndiWW

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I've got a clipboard, a tablet, about 75 pages of paper, pens, cell phone charger, napkins, id cards. It's got plenty of room left.
customer_reviews.author: CADFF

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much, I referred to my friend who also bought it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Had for a year as a LE and doing well. Wish I would have purchased years ago
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Plastic clip is cheap cant put much in it.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be larger storage but it Fit more than I thought it would . It was great for a month and then it just broke while driving. The plastic clip on strap just broke. Very disappointed and have to throw it away as there is no way to reattach only buy a clip and sew it on and nope thats not my fortay..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: I am a trucker and I was looking for something to help me stay organized. This has differently been a big help in keeping my front passenger seat clutter free. Don't have to worry about my clipboard or any other items moving around in a sudden stop. The quality of the material is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So why a 4 overall? Mainly the strap. It’s not poor quality. It’s too short for my patrol car which is an expedition. The strap kept slipping loose. Easily fixed with electrical tape. Overall love the product and would buy it again. They just need to add about 5 inches to the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Fits perfect in the front seat for all my work equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: As a home health nurse I've turned my car into an office. The DMoose assists me by keeping office supplies at the ready. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: It's not amazing or life changing. But it does it's job well and after a month in my work truck, appears to be of sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It is great because my car doesn't have enough storage.
customer_reviews.author: Shaggie

customer_reviews.title: Organized
customer_reviews.text: Have not used long enough to make long term appraisal. Like ability to organize items
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Chastang

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: I used this organizer while doing field work in the National Forest. It held up really well and was exactly what I needed to keep everything from bumping around and falling while driving on rough roads.
customer_reviews.author: Annalisa Browning

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Keeps my stuff from flying off the seat every time I stop or turn a corner!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Quantity of this is good. Shipping was as expected
customer_reviews.text: Quantity of this is good. Shipping was as expected. If I had one complaint, it would be that it could be a little longer and have more pockets. Other than that, it fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of just throwing stuff on my front seat. This keeps it organized and I don't have to worry about it rolling off the seat during drives.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Just got it and excited to start using it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and excited to start using it. Looks exactly as pictures. well made, i can tell it will take me quite some time to wear this out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price. Beats the Uncle Mike's products.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in my Dodge Charger police car. Keeps things right at hand and keeps them from falling on the floorboards after every turn or hard stop.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: The organizer holds everything I need it to. I feels durable and is quite easy to move to the back seat when I have someone riding shotgun. Thanks for a very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Truck Clutter Free!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use this in my work truck and it keeps everything within easy reach. I spend most of my time in the field and my truck doubles as my office. I can easily fit my toughbook, two cell phones, wireless mouse, tech manuals and a pretty decent sized clipboard with room to spare. If I ever have a passenger I just flip it around and everything is still in reach.
customer_reviews.author: RYNOROCK

customer_reviews.title: Why did I not purchase this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I now have the perfect organizer for my car seat. I keep it in the front seat of my car where it is easy to reach. I wish I had bought this sooner, because it has now saved me a lot of time!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Streetman

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag to have if you are organized and working out of your vehicle. Plenty of pockets and pretty strudy
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The organization that it offers has saved ne so much more space inside of my patrol car and allows me to have more maneuverability!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Great for the price. Wish the strap was higher quality, but I have had no issue with it
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Tree
customer_reviews.text: Items are great, but can delivery at least ring the door bell; I would not no package was at door Thanks
customer_reviews.author: RDTREE99

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s a pretty good product. Nothing to complain about. It’s not cheaply made and is exactly what it says it it. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for my job as a home health nurse until it ripped out at the main seem after only 2-3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product is outstanding. I highly recommend it. A fellow hospice nurse and I both are loving ours. I’m using it everyday and couldn’t be any happier! Best purchase this year!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Good product. I used it to hold me work stuff no tears and it has been used on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: david orozco

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I love my organizer. I wish it was no the material was more turdy. But i still love
customer_reviews.author: Tika Toney

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it fits an Atlas
customer_reviews.text: This thing fits everything I need. A laptop, a water bottle, an atlas, various pens and pencils -- Customer support is stellar, too. (Even on holidays.)
customer_reviews.author: C. R. West

customer_reviews.title: Durable black organizer gets job done
customer_reviews.text: I like the product so far its been a good little organizer for my cars front seat i was able to put my phone a few pens recipts tablet wallet water bottle so its been handy
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Alrayyan

customer_reviews.title: Love this organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car organizer, keeps all my things from ending up on the floor . I highly recommend this product , an inexpensive way to keep you organized and happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Harney

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: It has lots of pockets. I am an on the road mechanic... It holds my ticket books and lap top as well as various other items. Keeps them organized and handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product good vender.
customer_reviews.text: A place for all my traveling junk and more. Swings out of the way when I have a passenger.
customer_reviews.author: RMB

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be built well
customer_reviews.text: Bottle holders are a little smaller than hoped but over all very happy. Cleans the seat up so things don't end up in floor board.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This organizer seems great so far. But I have only had it for a day. Hopefully it stands the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: SamHain

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the junk off my front seat.
customer_reviews.text: Good organizer. Makes it so all my junk does go everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this! Got it for his semi truck. The strap is long enough it fit semi seats!

customer_reviews.title: Need a replacement
customer_reviews.text: It said a lifetime warranty ... how to I get a replacement ?
customer_reviews.author: Kim LaFrance

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, with big pockets
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy design, and it has an adjustable strap so it fits easily over the headrest in my kenworth truck. Works wonderfully well, and the main pocket is big enough it holds my file folder, a 3 ring binder, and the keyboard for my qualcomm. It hasn't bowed out like some of the other products I've used. Overall, I'm highly impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to rotate to backseat as needed
customer_reviews.text: Have tried items like this in the past and been disappointed. This one is flexible, but sturdy, doesn't sag and is easy to shift to hang behind the seat as needed.
customer_reviews.author: amy a

customer_reviews.title: Great Truckers Organizer
customer_reviews.text: To my fellow truckers, this is an ideal passenger seat organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great car organizer
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. The item was exactly a described. Well made. The large pocket works great and fully hides my large work tablet. Perfect for anyone who uses their car as an office.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Strap should be longer but it works in my patrol ...
customer_reviews.text: Strap should be longer but it works in my patrol car when I extend it with paracord. Already beat it up quite a bit with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Good product and delivered right on time
customer_reviews.author: Micah Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect organizer for front seat. Doesn't take up seat space and has just the right amount of room
customer_reviews.author: JS Lark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Cacey OFarril

customer_reviews.title: Fan freaking tastic!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely freaking perfect! Holds flashlights, ticket book, note pad, pens, water bottle, the front pockets fit the radar tuning forks perfectly. To be honest I feel like I got more than my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Icard

customer_reviews.title: Passenger seat is now clutter free
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer. Keeps everything that I used to have laying on the front passenger seat in an organized manner and the best part is that it easily swings to the back when I have a passenger. No more scrambling to clear the seat off!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Krause

customer_reviews.title: about the right size, appears well made
customer_reviews.text: Used to organize car - helpful, and can be moved from car to car without much trouble
customer_reviews.author: R. Bonneau

product_meta.title: DMoose Car Front Seat Organizer with Laptop and Tablet Storage, Compact Passenger Side Caddy with Neoprene Water Bottle Pockets, File Folder Sleeves, and Space Saving Compartments
feature_bullets: SMART, ACCESSIBLE SEAT FRONT ORGANIZER – An all-in-one storage options for travelers and on-the-go professions this seat organizer has pockets and sleeves for a laptop or tablet, file folders, documents, smartphone, pens, water bottles and an umbrella.

PERSONAL AND PROFESSIONAL-GRADE USE – This car storage organizer front seat edition is ideal for traveling hospice nurses, police officer, cab and UBER drivers, or busy parents who are always traveling back and forth between work and child events.

REINFORCED, LONG-TERM STABILITY – Each front seat organizer features a heavy-duty plastic back support, stronger buckles, and longer adjustable web straps to help keep it from moving around and to ensure it doesn’t sag or break down over time.

PREMIUM 600D FABRIC AND THERMAL POCKETS – The 8 external pockets and accessible sleeves offer true travel accessibility, while the dual insulated neoprene side sleeves help keep a hot thermos or a cold water bottle the right temperature longer.

TRUSTED DMOOSE LIFETIME GUARANTEE – Like all of our quality of life home products and accessories our front seat organizer comes with our lifetime guarantee to ensure your total happiness and a risk-free purchase. Contact us with any questions.
